name: Elegant All-Over Print & Embroidered 3-Piece Lawn Suit 2026 | Chiffon Dupatta (Casual)
description: Unstitched 3-piece Embroidered Lawn Suit 2026 (Summer Collection) with Sequins Embroidered Front, Printed Lawn Back/Sleeves, and Heavy Embroidered Daman Patch. Includes Printed Soft Chiffon Dupatta and Printed Cambric Trouser.
longDescription:
Embrace the essence of summer elegance with this stunning **3-piece unstitched lawn suit** from our **2026 Collection**. This outfit masterfully combines luxurious fabrics with intricate craftsmanship to create a perfect ensemble for your casual wardrobe.

The shirt is a work of art, featuring a **Sequins Embroidered Front** that catches the light beautifully, contrasted with a matching **all-over Printed Lawn Back and Sleeves**. The elegance continues with a **Heavy Embroidered Daman Patch** at the hem, adding a traditional touch to the modern silhouette.

The outfit is complemented by a flowy, **Printed Soft Chiffon Dupatta** that adds a layer of grace and movement with every step. The included **Printed Cambric Trouser** ensures maximum comfort and a perfect drape.

Crafted from high-quality, breathable lawn, this suit is designed to keep you cool and stylish throughout the season. The color and design are exactly as shown in the pictures, offering a vibrant and attractive look ready for any **Casual** occasion.

**Key Features:**
* **Product Type:** 3-Piece Embroidered Lawn Suit (Unstitched Fabric)
* **Contents:** Shirt, Trouser, Dupatta
* **Shirt:** Seqins Embroidered Front, Printed Lawn Back & Sleeves, Heavy Embroidered Daman
* **Dupatta:** Printed Soft Chiffon
* **Trouser:** Printed Cambric
* **Occasion:** Perfect for Casual Outings, Daytime Events, and Gatherings
* **Condition:** Unstitched - Ready to be tailored to your perfect fit

specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash or gentle machine wash separately in cold water. Do not bleach. Hang to dry in shade. Low iron setting recommended. Store flat in a dry place.
